mapper.select: SELECT POST_ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_CREATED, POST_VIEW, USER_NICKNAME, GROUP_ID, LEVEL, POST_SEQ FROM BOARD_POST JOIN USER ON BOARD_POST.USER_ID = USER.USER_ID ORDER BY GROUP_ID, POST_SEQ DESC;
SELECT POST_ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_CREATED, POST_VIEW, USER_NICKNAME, GROUP_ID, LEVEL, POST_SEQ FROM BOARD_POST JOIN USER ON BOARD_POST.USER_ID = USER.USER_ID WHERE POST_ID = #{POST_ID};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_POST (POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, USER_ID, GROUP_ID, LEVEL, POST_SEQ) VALUES(#{POST_TITLE}, #{POST_CONTENT}, #{USER_ID}, #{GROUP_ID}, #{LEVEL}, #{POST_SEQ});
